The IBM Semeru Runtimes are free production-ready binaries built with the OpenJDK class libraries and the Eclipse OpenJ9 JVM.

Eclipse OpenJ9 is the VM from the Eclipse community. It is an enterprise-grade VM designed for low memory usage and fast start-up and is used in IBMâ€™s JDK. It is suitable for running all workloads.

For more details see Eclipse OpenJ9.
